firstTimeGreeting.content: Hey! I'm super excited that you called! Want to know what I've got in store for us today?
Today we're visiting Sensei! He owns a Japanese restaurant and makes all sorts of delicious food, samurai style! You know what a samurai is, right buddy?
Cool! Well, I heard Sensei needs some samurai chef apprentices. Let's go find out more!
Greetings, Sensei! This is my friend. We're here to learn your ways!
Hello! Ah, you wish to be my disciples. First, I have one question: do you like... sushi?
People say I'm the wisest, most skilled sushi samurai in the world! But my passion is also to teach others. Do you have what it takes to learn from a master?
Oh yeah! Let's prove to Sensei that we can become Sushi Masters!  Alexa, tell us the available paths!

playerWithAwardsGreeting.content: Welcome back! I'm so happy to see you again....Alexa, please give our friend a royal greeting!
%titles%. You have %low_color% belt Chef, %mid_color% belt Sumo, %high_color% belt Guru.

exitPhrase.content: I don't believe it! You have become the Ultimate Samurai Chef! It is an honor being your friend!
You're amazing! Now that's an incredible nickname that's well earned! How do you feel about becoming the Ultimate Sushi Samurai?
It's been a pleasure teaching you. Perhaps there will be greater challenges someday for you to master!
Thanks Sensei. Well, one thing you can do is reset your progress. Would you like to start Samurai Chef all over?
